channel.title: [DELTA] NPC Help. [DELTA]
channel.description:
I am working on fully animating my God Wars NPCs, and I have a few things I need help animating. I have all of the animation IDs, and I know how to make the NPC do that animation. I have made my NPC's pretty good, but I want to know where do I edit my NPC's "block" animation, and when they walk to you, it is all mushed up because it has the wrong "walk" animation. I do have the correct IDs, but I can't find out where I change them. I am in NPCHandler.Java, and that is where all of the other NPC animations are, such as; their "attack" animations, and "dying" animations.
P.S. I want to find out how to change NPC hitpoints level. I used to know, but I forgot. =[
All reasonable help is appreciated.
EDIT: I found out how to fix the "block" animation. I still need help on:
[s]1. How to edit the NPC's "walk" animation.[/s] [s]2. How to edit the NPC's Hitpoints level.[/s] [s]3. How to edit the NPC's "stand" animation.[/s] [s]4. How to edit the NPC's "block" animation.[/s]

item.title: [DELTA] NPC Help. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

lover854:

3. if its costom npc its in class5 too else it cant i think

Ty, that fixed 1, and 3. =) Still having trouble on 2.

EDIT: NVM. All of the help worked. Thank you both very much. Time to finnish my gw project.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

[quote=“lover854, post:2, topic:331687”]1. In class 5 of your client if its a costum npc

2 npc.cfg and search np id and change the 12 (just took a npc) to like 255

npc = 7		Farmer				7	12

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] NPC Help. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

I am working on fully animating my God Wars NPCs, and I have a few things I need help animating. I have all of the animation IDs, and I know how to make the NPC do that animation. I have made my NPC’s pretty good, but I want to know where do I edit my NPC’s “block” animation, and when they walk to you, it is all mushed up because it has the wrong “walk” animation. I do have the correct IDs, but I can’t find out where I change them. I am in NPCHandler.Java, and that is where all of the other NPC animations are, such as; their “attack” animations, and “dying” animations.

P.S. I want to find out how to change NPC hitpoints level. I used to know, but I forgot. =[

All reasonable help is appreciated.

EDIT: I found out how to fix the “block” animation. I still need help on:

1. How to edit the NPC’s “walk” animation.
2. How to edit the NPC’s Hitpoints level.
3. How to edit the NPC’s “stand” animation.
4. How to edit the NPC’s “block” animation.

Read full topic
